item.description:
Whether you are newly vegan, considering going vegan, or a veteran, you can benefit from sharing ideas with other vegans. How many times have you had to reinvent the wheel? (Shopping for a new pair of vegan winter boots, need a vegan mascara, found a vegan restaurant that you love or a recipe that you could share.) We can learn a lot from each other! Come for conversation and potluck.

Please bring a vegan dish and/or beverage to share.  We love sharing recipes. So, if it's easy to do feel free to bring a list of the ingredients of your recipe to display beside your dish.

If you need direction finding the address call # 508-405-1551.
item.name: Vegan Potluck & Chat
